00021 namespace McMd

00023 
00024    using namespace Util;

00026    /*
00027    * Constructor.
00028    */
00029    BoundaryAverage::BoundaryAverage(System& system) 
00030     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00031       outputFile_(),
00032       accumulators_(),
00033       nSamplePerBlock_(-1),
00034       isInitialized_(false)
00035    {}
00036 
00037    /*
00038    * Read parameters from file, and allocate accumulators array.
00039    */
00040    void BoundaryAverage::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00041    {
00042 
00043       readInterval(in);
00044       readOutputFileName(in);
00045       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00046 
00047       accumulators_.allocate(Dimension+1);
00048 
00049       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension+1; ++i) {
00050          accumulators_[i].setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00051       }
00052 
00053       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00054       if (accumulators_[0].nSamplePerBlock()) {
00055          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00056       }
00057  
00058       isInitialized_ = true;
00059    }
00060 
00061    /*
00062    * Initialize at beginning of simulation.
00063    */
00064    void BoundaryAverage::setup() 
00065    {
00066       if (!isInitialized_) {
00067          UTIL_THROW("Error: object is not initialized");
00068       }
00069       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension+1; ++i) {
00070          accumulators_[i].clear();
00071       }
00072 
00073    }
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Evaluate volume and lengths of cell, add to ensemble.
00077    */
00078    void BoundaryAverage::sample(long iStep) 
00079    { 
00080       if (!isAtInterval(iStep)) return;
00081 
00082       Vector lengths;
00083       double volume;
00084       
00085       lengths = system().boundary().lengths();
00086       volume = system().boundary().volume();
00087       
00088       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00089          accumulators_[i].sample(lengths[i], outputFile_);
00090       }
00091       accumulators_[3].sample(volume, outputFile_);
00092 
00093    }
00094 
00096    void BoundaryAverage::output() 
00097    { 
00098       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00099       if (accumulators_[0].nSamplePerBlock()) {
00100          outputFile_.close();
00101       }
00102  
00103       // Echo parameters to a log file
00104       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00105       writeParam(outputFile_);
00106       outputFile_.close();
00107 
00108       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00109       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00110       for (int i = 0; i < Dimension; ++i) {
00111          accumulators_[i].output(outputFile_);
00112          outputFile_ << std::endl;
00113       }
00114       outputFile_.close();
00115       
00116    }
00117 
00118    /*   
00119    * Save state to binary file archive.
00120    */
00121    void BoundaryAverage::save(Serializable::OArchiveType& ar)
00122    { ar & *this; }
00123 
00124    /*
00125    * Load state from a binary file archive.
00126    */
00127    void BoundaryAverage::load(Serializable::IArchiveType& ar)
00128    { ar & *this; }
00129 
00130 }
